tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: It was a great experience. I had a RCT done for my molar teeth and It was good. Dr Deeksha explained it properly and did the treatment in a clean and proper way.
Excellent Doctor with a thorough knowledge.Did RCT without pain short duration and no waiting time.My best wishes

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I visited Dr Sharma, last month, for general check up and for a gap between my teeth and gums.

Dr's prescription and her advice worked for me.
Dr. Sharma has patience to listen to the patient and also to explain the treatment.
Shall visit for regular check ups and cleaning.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Went for a cleaning and fillings.
Felt like a very comfortable and hygienic space.
Would recommend to everyone!
reply_text: Thank you sir for your kind words.

tags: Wait time,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review: Visited Dr Deeksha for RCT. Due to prior appointment there was no waiting. Dr explained the whole process and pain subsided after first visit. Later visited for filling and cap. She is very capable and meticulous about her work.
reply_text: Thank you so much for your kind words.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Great experience. Doctor made me feel at ease and explained everything in depth. Will highly recommended Dr. Deeksha's and her staffs expertise.

tags: Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,Doctor friendliness,
review: I am very pleased with the treatment and explanation from Dr. Deeksha and everyone from her clinic.  I would definitely recommend it to anyone.
She is good at making accurate diagnosis. My toothache is relieved and root cause is treated accordingly without any unnecessary visits.
reply_text: Thank you sir for your kind words.

review: Had a great experience at this clinic. Well behaved staff and expert doctor. Highly recommended this place for dental problems.
I went for teeth cleaning to the doctor. The doctor and staff was very friendly and the atmosphere very soothing! I totally see myself and my family visiting the doctor again.
reply_text: Thank you for your kind words.
